transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Err, Moltar? (waves out of frame) Moltar? (loop increases in speed and pitch) Hey! Dummy!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (invisos into control room) What's going on in here?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: What are you going to do, spank us?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (kicks boom box out of shot, silencing it) Moltar, are you aware of the health risks caused by tallboys?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (burps) Uhh, yeah, but (with emphasis) it makes you feel like a cowboy! (drinks)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Woo! (stands back up, beat) Surfboard! (leaps on top of desk, makes surf noises with his mouth)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: He's gonna hurt himself. Probably fatally.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Shark! (flies offscreen to drum set, where he hits bass drum a few times) Eh heh heh. (hits cymbal)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: What do you think of that?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: That you are now my girlfriend and we are going out twelve times.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (to Jeff) You seen my drink? (Jeff stares at him) You better not have drank it.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Duh-- Maybe you should drink some water.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (angry) You drink some water with your ass!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Woo! Great party. (looks at Zorak) Great party, man.

transcript.speaker: Jeff Probst
transcript.dialogue: (nods) Good to be on, Space Ghost.

transcript.speaker: Jeff Probst
transcript.dialogue: Uhh, I am Jeff Probst, of...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (crouching behind desk, low voice) Shh, be quiet. (sound of glass tinkling) What was that? (sound of a low growl)

transcript.speaker: Jeff Probst
transcript.dialogue: Have you seen the show "Survivor," Space Ghost?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Uhh, yeah. A bunch of guys killin' each other.

transcript.speaker: Jeff Probst
transcript.dialogue: Well, it's a mixture of guys and girls.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (sitting up) Dancin' around, killin' each other.

transcript.speaker: Jeff Probst
transcript.dialogue: You run a real loose ship.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: What do you think of that?

transcript.speaker: Jeff Probst
transcript.dialogue: (laughs, nodding) That's neat! Kind of like Vegas.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I love you, guest. That's what's neat.

transcript.speaker: Jeff Probst
transcript.dialogue: Space Ghost, I'm as close to you right now as I want to be.

transcript.speaker: Jeff Probst
transcript.dialogue: (laughs) That is impressive! Oh, my gosh!

transcript.speaker: Jeff Probst
transcript.dialogue: You probably do okay with the ladies!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oh, hell yeah! Robot! (does robot, making robot noises for about 15 seconds)

transcript.speaker: Jeff Probst
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, you would have been great in a fraternity.

transcript.speaker: Jeff Probst
transcript.dialogue: Is anybody actually monitoring this show?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (looks at camera) Oh, pardon me! (laughs, looks away) Don't come in here. (takes another sip)

transcript.speaker: Jeff Probst
transcript.dialogue: I mean, I know you have a (makes quotes with fingers) "director." Is he actually...

transcript.speaker: Jeff Probst
transcript.dialogue: Does he do anything or does--?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Shut up, little man! (sprays monitor with foam) Dah! You have a drinking problem, don't I? (flies into ceiling) Woo! (falls down onto desk and then onto floor, knocking himself out)

transcript.speaker: Jeff Probst
transcript.dialogue: I knew there was something when I-- You know, when I first saw him that just didn't sit right.

transcript.speaker: Jeff Probst
transcript.dialogue: (nodding) You're real. You guys are real.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Shut up, little man. It'll never-- (vomits spray of green liquid) --Work. (vomits again, collapses to floor)

transcript.speaker: Jeff Probst
transcript.dialogue: Space Ghost, are you all right?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Uhh, I think I'm going to be sick. (lowers head and grunts, then looks up again) Hey, you want some wings?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I'll go get 'em. I can drive.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You want hot or mild? We'll get half and half.
